trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control in an application that was upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: Representa um item em uma <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"> </xref> controle em um aplicativo que foi atualizado do Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ListBox` and `ComboBox` controls use a `List` property to store list items and an `ItemData` property to optionally store an `Integer` associated with each list item.
trans-unit.target: No Visual Basic 6.0, o `ListBox` e `ComboBox` controles usam uma `List` propriedade para armazenar itens de lista e um `ItemData` propriedade opcionalmente armazenar um `Integer` associados a cada item de lista.

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property to store list items, and the `ItemData` property is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: Em [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controla o uso de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>propriedade para armazenar itens de lista e o `ItemData` propriedade não é mais suportada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a `ListBoxItem` class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo Visual Basic 6.0 é atualizado para [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], as ferramentas de atualização criam uma `ListBoxItem` classe para cada item em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A>funções, em seguida, podem ser usadas para habilitar a qualquer código que faz referência a `ItemData` propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um aplicativo Visual Basic 6.0 é atualizado para [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], as ferramentas de atualização criam uma <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>classe para cada item em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>e <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A>funções, em seguida, podem ser usadas para habilitar a qualquer código que faz referência a `ItemData` propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the list item.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o item de lista.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma instância do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o item de lista.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that represents the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref> que representa o Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""> </xref> valor.

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"> </xref> para <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must call the `ToString` method to convert the type.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>não pode ser convertido em um <xref:System.String>; você deve chamar o `ToString` método para converter o tipo.</xref:System.String> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>que contém o valor da <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
